---
config:
  layout: dagre
---
flowchart TD
 subgraph U["User / Laptop"]
        UA["RViz / GUI"]
        UB["Xbox Controller"]
        UC["Keyboard"]
  end
 subgraph O1["Azure Kinect DK Camera"]
        
        O1A2["/rgb/image_raw"]
        O1A["rgb/image_raw"]
        
        O1B2["/rgb/camera_info"]
        O1B["rgb/camera_info"]
        
        O1C2["/depth_to_rgb/image_raw"]
        O1C["depth_to_rgb/image_raw"]
  end
 subgraph O2["RTAB-Map"]
        O2A["rtabmap_odom (rgbd_odometry)"]
        O2B["rtabmap (rtabmap core)"]
        O5["Topics"]
  end
 subgraph O5["Topics"]
        O5A["/map"]

        O5C["/cloud_obstacles"]
  end
 subgraph O3D["Nav2 Remappings"]

  end

    O1A --> O1A2
    O1B --> O1B2
    O1C --> O1C2
    UA L_UA_O3A_0@-. Goal Pose (PoseStamped) .-> O3A

    O3B --> O3C
    O3C --> O3D
    O3D1 --> O3D2
    O1 L_O1B2_O2A_0@--> O2B
    O2A --> O2B
    O2B --> O5

    O4B --> O4C
    UB L_UB_O4_0@-.-> O4A
    UC L_UC_O4_0@-.-> O4A

    O3A -.  Loop until Goal Reached .-> O5
